en.name: I am Valentin,
en.culture-shuffle-description: Culture quiz application made with React, using the Open Trivia API to provide questions on music, cinema, fine arts, and literature.
en.eat-around-description: Full-stack React Nodejs app designed to help users discover and favorite dining establishments catering to vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free, halal, and kosher cuisines, including nearby restaurants, bakeries, and cafes.
en.super-secret-samples-description: [Work In Progress] SAAS Remix app of high quality audio samples to download for professional music producers.
